metadata.name: NFT project I am Bitcoin Art
metadata.description:
The first mini-picture of the 888 art works of the NFT project I am Bitcoin Art.  
Of the NFT Art project "I am Bitcoin Art" is a kind of monument to bitcoin, embodied in digital art. A large-scale NFT picture â€“ where all 21 million bitcoins are depicted for the first time. It consists of 888 dynamic NFT products. Owners of NFT mini-paintings can change the works in the future. The size of one mini-painting is 110.9 cm * 67.5 cm in high resolution.

attributes.trait_type: #1 NFT mini painting I am Bitcoin Art
